title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 § 8133.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 § 8133.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 94. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 94, between Route 17A and Route 17M
in the Villages of Florida and Chester, and Towns of Goshen and

Chester. (b) Route 17K. Route 17K
between Route 208 and Route 32 (Lake Street) in the Towns of Montgomery and

Newburgh and the City of Newburgh. (c) CR 64. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of CR 64, between Route 32 and CR 105, a distance of 1.9± miles
in the Towns of Monroe and Woodbury. (f) Route 17K (Broadway). The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Route 17K (Broadway), between IR 84 and Route 32 (Lake

Street), a distance of 5.25± miles in the Town of Newburgh and the City
of Newburgh. (g) Route 32 (Lake

Street). The northbound and southbound roadways of Route 32 (Lake Street)
between Route 17K (Broadway) and the Roadway Express, Incorporated terminal, a
distance of 3.0± miles in the City of Newburgh and the Town of New

Windsor. (h) CR 13 (Kings Highway). The northbound and southbound roadways of CR 13, between Route 17M and the

United Parcel Service terminal (at the intersection of Black Meadow Road/ Leone

Lane), a distance of 0.4± mile in the Village and Town of

Chester. (i) Route 17M. The
northwest and southeast roadways of Route 17M, between CR 13 and Route 94, a
distance of 0.8± mile in the Village of Chester. (j) Route 300. Route 300 between Route 52 and
the junction of Route 32 and Route 94 in the Towns of Newburgh and New

Windsor. (k) Route 17M. Route 17M
(Dolson Avenue) between IR 84 exit 3 and Republic Plaza, a distance of
1.3± miles in the Town of Wawayanda and the City of

Middletown. (m) [Eff. until Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (m) below.] Route 209. Route 209 between the Sullivan
county line and the C&D Battery facility, a distance of 6.9± miles
in the Town of Deer Park. (m) [Eff. Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (m) above.] US Route 209. US Route 209 between
the Pennsylvania state line and the Sullivan county line, a distance of
10.3± miles, in the City of Port Jervis and the Town of Deer

Park. (n) [Eff. until March 11, 1992, see also subd. (n) below.] Route 208. Route 208 between I-84 and Grant

Street, a distance of 3.6± miles in the Town of Montgomery and Village
of Walden. (n) [Eff. March 11, 1992, see also subd. (n) above.] Route 208. Route 208 between I-84 and the

Orange-Ulster county line, a distance of 6.3± miles in the Town of

Montgomery and Village of Walden. (o) Orange CR 25 (Pumpkin Swamp Road/Meadow

Street). The eastbound and westbound roadways of CR 25, between CR 6 and Route
17A, a distance of 2.0± miles in the Towns of Goshen and Warwick and the

Village of Florida. (p) Orange CR 6
(Pulaski Highway). The northbound and southbound roadways of CR 6, between CR 1
and CR 25, a distance of 5.2± miles in the Towns of Warwick and

Goshen. (q) CR. 35. CR 35 between
I-84 and US Route 6, a distance of 0.3± mile in the Town of

Greenville. (r) US Route 6. US
Route 6 between CR 35 and CR 1, a distance of 1.1± miles in the Town of

Greenville. (t) US Route 6/Route
17M. US Route 6/Route 17M between I-84 and CR 12, a distance of 1.5±
miles in the Town of Wawayanda. (v) Route 17. Route 17 between the Rockland county line and the junction of Route
32 and I-87 (exit 16) in the Village of Harriman and Towns of Tuxedo and

Woodbury. (w) Route 32. Route 32
between the junction of Route 17 and I-87 (exit 16) and the junction of Route
94 and Route 300 in the Towns of Woodbury, Cornwall and New Windsor. (x) Route 17M. Route 17M between Route 208
and Route 17, a distance of 3.4± miles in the Villages of Monroe and

Harriman and the Town of Monroe. (y) Route 208. Route 208 between Route 17M
and Route 17 (Quickway-exit 130), a distance of 0.8± mile in the Town of

Monroe and Village of Monroe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
§
8133.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
